WorkItem.Description:
I'm very happy with the new Rawr Addon cause I think it makes my life with Rawr and the item comparison much easier. But I simply have the problem that after I transferred my character via the Addon into Rawr and then (after some work in Rawr) the upgrade list back into the Addon, the Addon never ever shows me any possible upgrades for the weapon slot. Nevertheless in Rawr there are some possible upgrades for the weapon slot.
Every other slot seems to work correctly.
 
If it would help you identifying the problem I can post you my character in Rawr this evening when I'm back home.
 
Thank you 4 your help.
 
Additional Information:
Rawr Version: Rawr 4.0.19 Beta
Addon Version: 	Rawr v0.63
WorkItem.Summary: [Addon] Weapon Upgrades will be not imported into the Rawr Addon

Comments.Message: Yes, please include your Rawr export and your character file as attachments.
And now the Export into the Rawr Addon. Hope this helps.

Not sure what is happening I suspect it is when the list is getting built in Rawr.UI.GraphDisplay.xaml.cs however my VS2010 keeps saying "no symbols have been loaded for this document" so I cannot set breakpoint and cannot debug the code. Therefore I am removing myself as the person this is assigned to.

Jothay wrote that bit anyway :) ie: GetDirectUpgradesGearCalcs(bool divideByCost)

Any ideas why I can't set a breakpoint on that code? Any reason its linked to old Rawr3 code could that be the reason? Guessing the old Rawr3 project doesn't have a debug flag set or something.

I ran his file a few times and broke into it, I can confirm that Soul Blade and Mace of Acrid Death are both in the upgrade list text that is being exported, so there are weapon upgrades getting exported.
I believe the problem is on the addon's side
